pages.text: $(li)You can use Creeper Spores right clicking while are holding them in your hand to create an area with green particles.$(br)$(li)In this area, it will appear multiple $(l:patchouli:pets/savage_and_ravage/creepie)Creepiers$(/l).

$(li)These tiny creatures will follow you and they will follow and explode to the creature that you attack.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft $(l)Mischief Arrows$(), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/savage_and_ravage/blast_proof_plating)Blast Proof Platings$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/savage_and_ravage/spore_bomb)Spore Bombs$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/savage_and_ravage/creeper_spore_sack)Creeper Spore Sacks$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/creeper)Creepers$(/l) may drop this item if you kill them with an explosion of a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt)TNT$(/l).
